Name: Electro Batida
Ingredients: 10 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled coconut shell or collins glass.
Review: Cachaça and coconut water with a touch of hazelnut, lime and subtly smoky mezcal.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2014 by Jorge Balbontin, Vantguard Brand Development Manager.
Nutrition: One serving of Electro Batida contains 221 calories
Garnish: Desiccated coconut and dehydrated lime wheel
